title: Family Offense Forms (Family Court Act Article 8)
content:
Family Offense Forms (Family Court Act Article 8)

State Regulations

Form 8-2 - Family offense petition

Form 8-3 - Notice to the district attorney

Form 8-4 - Order of transfer for criminal prosecution

Form 8-5 - Family offense order of fact-finding and disposition

Form 8-6 - Order and notice to law enforcement agency (firearms licenses and surrenders)

Form 8-7 - Order of dismissal

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
